text: Why, then, have you not kept the oath of the LORD and the command that I gave you?‚Äù
The sons of Hebron were Korah, Tappuah, Rekem, and Shema.
The temple servants: descendants of Ziha, descendants of Hasupha, descendants of Tabbaoth,
And all those who were fleeing from the persecutions joined them and supported them.
The iron mixed with clay means that they shall seal their alliances by intermarriage, but they shall not stay united, any more than iron mixes with clay.
After they had completed its days, as they were returning, the boy Jesus remained behind in Jerusalem, but his parents did not know it.
Awe came upon everyone, and many wonders and signs were done through the apostles.
